'''Plinths of the Secret Rites''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They are controls for various mechanisms in the ruins, such as disabling [[Primal Barrier]]s, opening doors, and removing seals. Increase the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]]'s clearance to gain access to more plinths.
